content:
Dining - 4:00 PM to 10:30 PM, daily
Bar - 4:00 PM to 12:00 AM, daily

let's do dinner or drinks.

Seven Stills originally set out to make a craft whiskey for each of SF’s seven hills. Now, they’ve found a home at the summit of one of them. This casual spot on Nob Hill offers creative fare and brews you’ll want to bring home.  Equal parts brewery, distillery, and gastropub; their bold menu is designed to be “whiskey friendly” and shareable, broken up into “Heads,” “Hearts” and “Tails,” offering appetizers, mains and desserts inspired by the distillation process. Local wines are on tap and exciting cocktails anchored by Seven Stills famous artisanal bitters are also available. The Steak + Whiskey flight is an irreverent take on tired traditional steakhouse dinners. Try something new, and share it. This is the innovative/laid-back/only-in-San-Francisco dining experience and tap room you’re seeking.
